ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: XP bonus?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, did you ever try the running in lava bug near the giants? I saw someone who had a train of giants do this. She ran into the lava and the giants ran after
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, did you ever try the running in lava bug near the giants? I saw someone
who had a train of giants do this. She ran into the lava and the giants ran
after her. When the giants stepped back in the lava they got full life back
and returned to their spawn points. It apparently nullified the aggro too.
Doesn't work well with the caster ones and king though.
Oh, a bit of advice for any clerics waiting on Ragefire to pop in sola.. if
anyone pulls a train anywhere near you or runs to naggy, camp and wait a few
minutes. Sometimes the train runs around rampant after the person dies or
escapes and they will jump right on you.
luv,
-Su

> LOL not on Rodcet, except a few of us old school folks on crap puters. I
go
> to places like Sol A bc there's fewer assholes, hubby and I can hold any
> camp in zone except the king, the exp is still workable and the cash is
> nice. We're also usually the only ones around except maybe a cleric going
> for Lord Gimp.
